html:
4.29.17  11:02 pm   Is there a lot of phallic symbolism in your new video?

     not really. besides the long stick

4.29.17  10:42 pm   How many more parts to finishing this video?

     almost zero

4.29.17  10:39 pm   What is the best way to find joy in something that isn't conventionally joyful?

     try rotating it
4.29.17  10:38 pm   CAN YOU MAKE A SEQUEL TO HISTORY OF JAPAN?!

4.29.17  10:26 pm   did you write "i'm crazy / it's raining" a few years before making the video or were they made around the same time? because the expert mode timeline seems to suggest the latter

     the song was written in 2011. the song and video were both recorded in april 2014

4.29.17  10:24 pm   would you ever release your jingles separately, as individual tiny songs to listen to?

     i have done that for many of them

4.29.17  10:21 pm   why does misrepresentation feel horrible

     because you would rather be represented in the right way, not the wrong way

     and if i have been misrepresented how do i fix it

     you will have to represent yourself in the best way you can. and if you are rich perhaps hire a lawyer as well

4.29.17  9:22 pm   do you like tomatoes?

     they are ok

4.29.17  9:30 pm   my teacher stole my bag of rocks do you have any advice so i can get them back

     you could try to steal them back, or else call the police
4.29.17  9:19 pm   What approximate percentage is left to complete on the new video?

4.29.17  9:10 pm   If we're on "the road to nowhere"... what happens when we get there?!?!?!?!!?!?!

     probably nothing. unless you decide to make something up

4.29.17  9:09 pm   If "I think, therefore I am"... what am I if I just THINK I'm THINKING?!?!!?

     then you are thinking

4.29.17  8:48 pm   what do you want to know?

     everything, if possible

4.29.17  8:27 pm   Where did you learn music

     at home, and in the workplace

4.29.17  8:20 pm   Have you ever encountered a marsupial?

     i'm not sure
4.29.17  8:17 pm   Why do you never use capital letters?

4.29.17  8:17 pm   In "you're free to do whatever you want to," there's the sound of your thirst being quenched after you say "I'm afraid to speak my mind." In the accompanying video, there's an image of introvert soda to go with that sound. You usually think up songs long before you record them or make the videos. So was that sound in your original plan for the song or did you put it in just for the video?

     i think that is a rare case where i added a sound for the video. that sound might not be there in the audio version, i don't remember

4.29.17  8:16 pm   Is graphics troubleshooting the main ingredient in the many small fixes and adjustments phase?

     yes

4.29.17  8:15 pm   why do you think time goes forwards?

     time just goes how it goes. it is called 'forwards' because forwards means the direction that things normally go

4.29.17  7:43 pm   how cool do u think the scientific method is

     it seems reasonable

4.29.17  7:27 pm   how do u feel about punctuation

     i think it is a useful asset to any writer's tool kit

4.29.17  7:03 pm   I am SHOOK by your answer to the question where you mention a specific song rather than liking the qualities of each one. this is truly a momentous day. will you be liking specific things more often?

     this wonderful world is filled with such an intricate mixture of things to be liked or disliked, often simultaneously, in a constantly changing swirl. any attempt to stop the ride seems mostly problematic, and sad
4.29.17  6:28 pm   would you like to collaborate with me and make some tunes?

4.29.17  6:06 pm   you're doing more things than just hotewig so when you upload hotewig you have enough material to mantain constant uploads right?

     since last june, i have only been working on 1 project. i'm not sure if that answers your question

4.29.17  4:59 pm   What backup have you got in place to ensure you don't loose the progress of the video (eg in a house fire)

     i keep daily backups in my car also

4.29.17  4:33 pm   is hating yourself reasonable?

     not really, although it is normal to feel that way sometimes

4.29.17  4:24 pm   How many more items on the long list of small things to do are left?

     i'm not sure

4.29.17  4:01 pm   Have you ever thought about making a video in Comic Sans?

     not entirely

4.29.17  3:53 pm   Hey, will you make new songs in the future?

      oh hell yeah

4.29.17  3:09 pm   why did you make a museum of your mind and let people walk in it so deeply? i am very thankful for this because i like to walk around here... but why do you show all these thoughts and feelings, isn't that scary?

4.29.17  1:17 pm   What are you currently doing on hotewig? Jingles? Narration?

     making small fixes, adjustments

4.29.17  1:11 pm   How much do you know of the animal Duck

     a little bit

4.29.17  1:06 pm   if the temperature is 0 degrees and it will be twice as cold tomorrow, what will be the temperature?

     whatever tempurature you think is normal, put a negative sign in front of it
4.29.17  12:36 pm   What time zone is this webpage on?

4.29.17  12:09 pm   fans puttin pressure on you: good or bad?

     it's not particularly constructive, but it's a good sign

4.29.17  12:00 pm   whoa mr wurtz at 2:17 am on 7.7.16 you used capital letters in your answer. the fbi is on their way

     i have used capital letters many, many times since then. but i don't see what that has to do with the FBI

4.29.17  11:35 am   Bill, please make more 5 second videos, i love them so much

     i have already done way too many, compared to the amount of longer/medium length videos i want to make

4.29.17  11:33 am   How come the themes "making things right" and "it's gonna be alright" come up a lot in your songs? Do you ever think you made a significant mistake in life that you need to fix? Or that you need to keep telling yourself that everything's gonna be fine no matter what it looks like?

     it just seems like common sense, i guess

4.29.17  11:19 am   what if I don't want to ask a question on this page?

     then you probably shouldn't have

4.29.17  10:52 am   How to breathe?

     i'm not sure

4.29.17  9:19 am   My birthday is on the first May. Could you please release the video then? Would be the greatest gift because my parents can't afford anything special for me.

     i am trying to finish it as soon as i can

4.29.17  9:00 am   would you say your're proud of hoj/hotewig?

     oh hell yeah
4.29.17  8:31 am   why is thabk spelt like that on the thank you page

4.29.17  8:24 am   Have you got a graphic tablet?

     i do now

4.29.17  8:21 am   Why did you reveal HoTEWIG's acronym?

     it was always hidden, in plain sight

4.29.17  8:20 am   What is your opinion on carpet tiles/piles of dirt?

     they're ok

4.29.17  8:13 am   how close are you to finishing your new video???

     very, extremely

4.29.17  8:05 am   do you think there would be less loose ends in the graphics if you didn't make the dec 1 deadline

     i would probably be less far along by now

4.29.17  6:24 am   date me

     ok

4.29.17  5:43 am   when you don't answer a question, does that automatically mean showing that answer to thousands of people would be uncomfortable for you? or do you sometimes not answer questions because they are too boring, or because there are too many of them, or some other reason?

     all those are great reasons. another reason is if there's no answer
